name: nanos
description: A nanosvm unikernel module for Aesthetic Computer infrastructure.

scripts.sbcl: npm run pkg:clear; npm run pkg:sbcl; npm run pkg:sbcl:finish-a; npm run pkg:sbcl:finish-b; npm run pkg:sbcl:tree; npm run pkg:sbcl:load
scripts.pkg:sbcl:load: ops pkg load -c config-lisp.json -l sbcl_2.3.6-2.fc39 -a hello.lisp -p 8083 -v
scripts.gcp:deploy:image: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops image create -c config-gcp.json --package eyberg/node:20.5.0 -a hi.js -i aesthetic-static -t gcp -c config-gcp.json
scripts.gcp:deploy:image:list: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops image list -t gcp -c config-gcp.json
scripts.gcp:deploy:image:delete: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops delete aesthetic-static -t gcp -c config-gcp.json
scripts.gcp:deploy:instance: f() { export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops instance create aesthetic-static -t gcp -c config-gcp.json -i $1; };f
scripts.gcp:deploy:instance:list: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops instance list -j -t gcp -c config-gcp.json
scripts.gcp:deploy:instance:delete: f() { export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops instance delete $1 -t gcp -c config-gcp.json; };f
scripts.do:deploy:image: ops image create -c config-do.json --package eyberg/node:20.5.0 -a hi.js -i aesthetic-static -t do -c config-do.json
scripts.do:deploy:instance: f() { ops instance create aesthetic-static -t do -c config-do.json -i $1; };f
scripts.do:deploy:instance:delete: f() { ops instance delete $1 -t do -c config-do.json; };f

author: Jeffrey Alan Scudder
